thread.title: Kim Kardashian dons trench coat and faux lip ring in NYC
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian dons trench coat and faux lip ring in NYC | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.com
title: Kim Kardashian dons trench coat and faux lip ring in NYC

organizations.name: balenciaga balenciaga all time over-the-knee leather boots now

text:
Kim Kardashian turned heads while leaving a New York office building on Thursday dressed in an elegant black trench coat with lace-up boots.
The 36-year-old reality star rocked a faux lip ring - an accessory she's been sporting on and off for over a month.
Leggy! Kim Kardashian shows off a bit of upper thigh in revealing trench and thigh-high boots while leaving an office building in New York City Thursday evening
What a lady! Teh reality star turned heads earlier while leaving her hotel, dressed in an elegant black trench coat with her faux lip ring and lace-up boots
The stunning Keeping Up With The Kardashians star looked incredible in her calf-length belted coat.
The mother of two finished off her stylish ensemble with textured cream boots.
The wife of Kanye West wore her long brunette tresses sleek and center parted behind her shoulders.
Kim decided to go for a more minimalist approach for her makeup; she wore a touch of clear gloss on her full lips and brown shadow on her lids.
Touch of gold: The 36-year-old reality star rocked a faux lip ring - an accessory she's been sporting on and off for the past two months
Busy lady: She was seen leaving an office building later in the day as it started to get dark in NYC
Fashionista: She showed off her snakeskin boots from an entirely different angle in a photo posted to Snapchat
The gentleman escorting her to her waiting car held on to her black Hermes Birkin bag.
Kim is currently in New York City with her two children: daughter North, three, and son Saint, one.
The entrepreneur and her attorneys flew to the Big Apple to give testimony to a French judge on Wednesday, which included watching security footage from that night in order to try and identify the armed men.
Doting mom: Kim is currently in New York City with her two children: daughter North, three, and son Saint, one; pictured leaving their hotel on Wednesday
Give bad style the boot like Kim Kardashian wearing Balenciaga Balenciaga All Time Over-the-Knee Leather Boots

Over the knee boots are a winter wardrobe must-have and look great with everything from jeans to skirts and dresses, plus they're warm!
Kim Kardashian knows what we're talking about, stepping out in a statement pair by Balenciaga that are actually more thigh-high than over-the-knee! Kardashians don't do things by halves.
Kim has teamed hers with a luxe-looking fur wrap coat by Louis Vuitton, looking the epitome of winter chic in the process.
Whatever way you rock them, thigh high boots need not break the bank. So if you want a pair for less, head to the carousel below where you'll find alternatives from as little as £29.99.

Bundled up: The entrepreneur and her attorneys flew to the Big Apple for her Paris robbery testimony; seen on Wednesday heading back to her hotel
Kim again showed off her faux lip ring during an outing with her children on Wednesday, adding a heavy fur coat and thigh-high boots.
She debuted the trendsetting lip adornment on Christmas Day 2016 during the Kardashian family's annual holiday party.
She is due to head to court once more on Thursday to answer any further questions related to her terrifying ordeal, according to TMZ .
Golden goddess: She debuted the trendsetting lip adornment on Christmas Day 2016 during the Kardashian family's annual holiday party
Last October, the brunette beauty was robbed of millions of dollars worth of jewelry at gunpoint inside a Paris hotel.
During the heist, the starlet was gagged and bound by the robbers before they ran off with her jewelry - including her $4 million diamond ring given to her by Kanye.
Seventeen people have been arrested related to the robbery, reports TMZ.
Before the ordeal: During the heist, the starlet was gagged and bound by the robbers before they ran off with her jewelry - including her $4 million diamond ring given to her by Kanye.
